name: That One Night V1.1
description:
This game is made by JiwaDeadliner Team For A Jam About Time.  This game is only a prototype and only consist of two-level. Please rate this game if you want us to fully develop this game into something special :)

Control:

 Move Right:  "D"

Move Left: "A"

Jump: "W"

Switch Character :  Press 1 for TheBoy, Press 2 for Alien

Shoot Projectile ability:  First change your character to TheBoy. And Then Press the Space Button to shoot the projectile

Slow Time Ability: First change ur character to Alien. And then Press Q to slow time. You can use this ability to jump to a moving platform if it is moving too fast. And you can also use this ability to avoid enemy that are too much for you to handle. This ability has a 20 second cooldown time. And while using this ability you can shoot projectile. But you cant shoot projectile if this ability is not being used or in a cooldown.

BUG FIX:  English: - Because Alien are a mysterious creature sometime they can make you stuck between the walls. So if you ever get stuck just Press R to restart the level.

                  - If you die while using Slow Time Ability you have to press 1 and 2 after you restart or you will be stuck with the Slow Time Ability

  

Indonesian : - Karena Alien adalah makhluk yang misterius terkadang mereka bisa membuat karakter kalien terjebak diantara tembok sehingga kalian tidak bisa bergerak. Jika itu terjadi tekan R dan level akan diulang.

                               - Jika kalian mati saat sedang menggunakan ability Slow Time pastikan kalian menekan 1 lalu 2 setelah restart atau kalian akan terjebak dalam Slow Time Ability.

Tutorial in English: All you need to do is find the portal to the next level. You can destroy the brown door. And for the red door you need to find a red button to open it. You don't have to interact with it just make sure TheBoy touch the red button.

Tutorial  in Bahasa Indonesia: Yang harus kamu lakukan hanyalah mencari jalan sampai ke portal untuk lanjut ke level selanjutnya. Jika kamu melihat pintu coklat kalian tinggal tembak saja pintu itu. Jika kalian melihat pintu merah kalian harus mencari tombol merah untuk membukanya. Kalian hanya harus memastikan bahwa karakter TheBoy menyentuh tombol itu lalu pintu merah akan terbuka.

P.S.: There is no time limit in this game so take your time and enjoy our game. We are really sorry if there is a lot of bug in this game because we really made this game from scratch in just two week don't to expect too much from it hehe :))

That's it good luck ;))

Best Regards, JiwaDeadlinerTeam
